statements: DELETE FROM scientific_literature WHERE author = 'John Smith'
DELETE FROM scientific_literature WHERE id = 101 AND author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM scientific_literature WHERE citations < 10 OR publication_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM authors WHERE author_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM publications WHERE publication_year < 2000 AND author_id IN (SELECT author_id FROM authors WHERE author_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM authors WHERE author_id = 5 OR author_id = 7;
DELETE FROM articles WHERE keywords IS NULL OR author_id = 1;
